Keywords: Assassin , Deadpool Corps , Thunderbolts , Weapon X , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Wade Wilson
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters
GOT EVERYONE GOODIE BAGS!: At the beginning of the game, give each friendly character a Goodie Bag token and roll a d6. This game, friendly characters have the listed effect: 1-2: Balloons! - FREE: Remove a Goodie Bag token to gain [Wing symbol] this turn. 3-4: Cake! - FREE: Remove a Goodie Bag token to heal 2 clicks. 5-6: Illegal Weapons! - FREE: Remove a Goodie Bag token to modify damage +1 this turn.
KATANAS AND PINATAS: Blades/Claws/Fangs. // When a friendly character KO's an opposing character, give them a Goodie Bag token.

Comments
November 22, 2021
tyroclix
WIN/LOSS: 2-2 I was really excited about getting this when I first read his card. Cheap, good stats, and a fun crazy effect. Upon getting him, I realized I misread his trait which dampened my excitement. Whereas I was hoping for a random effect - it turns out you roll at the start and that is all you will ever get that game. As mentioned already, great if you get the good stuff and meh when you don't. Care to guess my rolls? 4 games. First time, +1 damage. Second, third and fourth time (an entire tournament): Flight. While I made it work, oh what might have been. I don't like the cake is bigger than the dial so Deadpool doesn't fit into my holder correctly, but he is a decent figure of a character I am so-so on, anyway.
November 9, 2021
RockyRaccoon
He is fun as long as you roll anything but a 1-2. Because otherwise he’s completely useless. The flier thing is hardly ever useful in an actual game especially if you already have characters that have that. When you roll a 1-2, you kinda aren’t having fun if I’m honest cause there’s almost no point in using the goodie bag tokens imho. HOWEVER, if you get a 5-6 you will have an absolute great time
September 30, 2021
Bat-Phreak
IMO simple case of sculpt re-use. The slice of cake is used w/ the UltraChase Wade, and NECA/WK decided it was too much effort to remove from the blue figure....
September 29, 2021
muel0017
So what's the point of this guy having a slice of cake? Do you just use it as a goodie bag token for your own people or am I missing something?
August 31, 2021
Raygun13
He was the hero in last nights game. Hid him in Stealth & let my opponent try & hit a 20 DEF thanks to CR. They needed to hit him 2x in a row due to his PROB. He was reduced to Click 3 but I was able to REGEN back to Click 1 and win the day! He rolled a 6 at the beginning of the game and the extra damage was nice but not the key to wining. Btw, is the extra slice of cake just for fun or does it have a purpose since you'll need some generic tokens to use as Goodie Bags?
August 27, 2021
Vegaspunk
I really like the figure, but I feel like the sculpt reuse cheapens the ultra chase by a lot. Maybe they could've put the actual sculpt part on a normal dial for the LE and saved the special dial for the chase? Really great LE it just bugs me that the ultra-chase doesn't feel as cool when I can display a fundamentally similar sculpt for about $170 dollars less.
August 27, 2021
Dagguh
great figure. The cake tokens add a ton to your team. I was pleasantly surprised with how much utility they gave me.

Im gonna play him with the new R/F Multiple Man and SR 2x2 Madrox at 300. I feel like its good be way fun!!
June 25, 2021
Top10
This is such a fun dial that is 100% playable and cool. The sculpt is awesome. The Goodie Bag concept is unique yet not overpowered. And you can buy it ! Have a Thunderbolts team ready for Deadpool
May 29, 2021
Buckwheat
I think it's debatable whether the first effect is better than the second. But, I have to say that compared to those two, the last effect is pretty underwhelming. It just bothers me when the 5-6 result isn't the best; that's all.
May 28, 2021
Goop
Pretty good, 11atk and prob the whole dial. Stealth and CR is always a good combination. That opening roll will kinda make or break how good he is that game. The CAKE bonus is just amazing. Balloons and Illegal weapons are ok at best. Just on his dial alone though i'd say he's worth his points.
